aaad2fc9-9224-416c-a4cc-3575eaf5c5f6.description: Weissr® Capex Strategy enables you to define the optimal cash flow maximizing capex strategy by thorough scenario and sensitivity testing of numerous whole-business capital-related strategic alternatives. This certification verifies that the badge holder is prominent in operating the software. The badge holder is sufficiently knowledgeable in the field of Capex Strategy to be trusted by its organization to operate the sensitive data within the tool.
aaad2fc9-9224-416c-a4cc-3575eaf5c5f6.name: Weissr® Capex Strategy Proficiency I

badge_template_activities.title: The certification comprises instructor-led workshops and exercises performed individually and discussed in the group. The examination consists of two parts; a knowledge test that determines the theoretical understanding of Weissr® Capex Strategy, including the concepts of Capex Strategy and common pitfalls of standard capital allocation methods, and an exercise test which determines the badge holders ability to practically apply their knowledge in the tool Weissr® Capex Strategy.

4ea21508-3566-4b0d-8326-f607d45366b5.description: Weissr® Capex Strategy enables you to define the optimal cash flow maximizing capex strategy by thorough scenario and sensitivity testing of numerous whole-business capital-related strategic alternatives. This certification verifies that the badge holder is familiar with the concepts of Capex Strategy and the common pitfalls of standard capital allocation methods. The badge holder is trusted by its organization to update the Base Alternative data for strategic analysis.
4ea21508-3566-4b0d-8326-f607d45366b5.name: Weissr® Assets & Capexes

e33f6670-4edc-4ed5-968c-d9a899b6d126.description: Weissr® Capex Strategy enables you to define the optimal cash flow maximizing capex strategy by thorough scenario and sensitivity testing of numerous whole-business capital-related strategic alternatives. This certification verifies that the badge holder is prominent in operating the software. The badge holder is sufficiently knowledgeable in the field of Capex Strategy to be trusted by its organization to operate the sensitive data for full scale strategic analysis within the tool.
